channel.title: java on Aomi
channel.description: Recent content in java on Aomi

item.title: Wsl2 Vscode Openjdk Install
item.description: 准备 进入wsl命令行，先更新系统,更新慢的可以换apt源处理，换源自行搜索。 $ sudo apt update -y $ sudo apt upgrade -y 安装JDK $ sudo apt install openjdk-8-jdk -y $ java -version openjdk version "1.8.0_275" OpenJDK Runtime Environment (build 1.8.0_275-8u275-b01-0ubuntu1~20.04-b01) OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM (build 25.275-b01, mixed mode) 再安装个 JDK 11 $ sudo apt install openjdk-11-jdk -y 安装maven 安装maven $ sudo apt install maven -y $ mvn -v Apache Maven 3.6.3 Maven home: /usr/share/maven Java version: 1.8.0_275, vendor: Private Build, runtime: /usr/lib/jvm/java-8-openjdk-amd64/jre Default locale: en, platform encoding: UTF-8 OS name: "linux", version: "4.
